whatsMoodflix.title: What is Moodflix?
whatsMoodflix.description: Moodflix is ​​an AI-powered app that helps you find the perfect movie for your mood. Whether you're happy, nostalgic, melancholic, or motivated, Moodflix recommends movies that align with your emotions so you can enjoy a unique and meaningful experience. And if you can't find the words to describe how you're feeling, you can also choose from a list of moods to get a personalized recommendation.

howItWorks.title: How does Moodflix work?
howItWorks.description1: Moodflix uses artificial intelligence to understand how you feel. Simply type in a short description of your mood, or choose from our list of emotions and feelings to identify the one that best reflects your current moment. With these options, Moodflix ensures that any user, no matter how they express themselves, can receive recommendations that connect with their emotions.
howItWorks.description2: Moodflix combines Google’s Gemini API and Vercel AI SDK to interpret the emotions in your text or the emotion you select, and then suggests movies based on this analysis. Plus, thanks to the integration with TMDB API, each recommendation includes the movie poster, rating, release year, and genres, creating a complete experience.

technology.title: Technology used
technology.description1: Powered by AI and Rich Data Moodflix combines the power of emotion analysis, machine learning and rich movie data to bring you truly personalized recommendations.

next.title: Next.js
next.description: Moodflix is ​​built with Next.js, a powerful React framework for building backend and frontend in a single project.

gemini.title: Google Gemini API
gemini.description: Identify and classify the emotional tone of your text or selected emotion, ensuring that each recommendation is aligned with your mood.

TMDB.title: TMDB API
TMDB.description: It allows us to enrich each recommendation with details from the movie so that you have a complete and visually appealing experience.

technology.description2: Thanks to these technologies, Moodflix is ​​not just a movie recommender, but a tool that adapts to your emotional world and presents movies to you in a unique way.

question1.question: Is Moodflix free?
question1.answer: Yes, Moodflix is completely free! Just select your mood or choose one from our list, and you're ready to find a great movie!

question2.question: Does the app store information about my mood?
question2.answer: No, Moodflix does not store any information about your emotional state. We only use your data to generate recommendations, and then it is deleted, ensuring your privacy.

question3.question: What types of movies can I expect in the recommendations?
question3.answer: Moodflix offers a wide variety of movies tailored to match your current mood. Our recommendations span across multiple genres—from feel-good comedies to intense thrillers, heartfelt dramas, and inspiring documentaries.

question4.question: How accurate are the recommendations?
question4.answer: While our recommendations are based on AI analysis and user feedback, they may not always be perfect. However, we’re continuously working to improve the accuracy and personal relevance of our suggestions.

thanks.title: Thanks for using Moodflix
thanks.description: Thank you for taking the time to explore Moodflix! Your support means a lot to me. I created this app in hopes of helping you discover movies that resonate with your emotions and enhance your viewing experience. If you have any feedback, suggestions, or just want to share your favorite movies, please feel free to reach out to me. Happy watching!
